name: postcss-inline-variables
description: PostCSS plugin for Sass-like variables with inline defaults

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-with-coverage
scripts.coveralls: npm run test-with-coverage -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
